topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551106b36368725bd4d40800#post_551106b36368725bd4d40800
What is it about?
topics.author: 4fdef063945b700a9d01604f

topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551106d863687230ee991000#post_551106d863687230ee991000
A 26 year old female teacher named Shiori gets haunted by the ghost of Jimi Hendrix and of she doesn't become a musical legend within the next year she's gonna be joining the 27 Club.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551107506368724e095d0c00#post_551107506368724e095d0c00
Okay,  it'd probably make more sense when someone reads it.
topics.author: 4fdef063945b700a9d01604f

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551107506368724e095d0c00#post_551107506368724e095d0c00
Only Japan could condense that much insanity into a single sentence.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551107996368722d3c7a0a00#post_551107996368722d3c7a0a00
If you don't know, the 27 Club refers to a number of musicians who died at the age of 27. Such musicians include Jim Morrison, Jimi Hendrix, Janis Joplin, ans Kurt Cobain. So basically Shiori has one year to get really famous or she's gonna fuckin' DIE.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
